nodes.text: Tazonthe Ghon was a male Lethan Twi'lek Pilgrim who lived on Tython illegally during the Cold War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic.

A Twi'lek male, Tazonthe Ghon was the son of Poronth Ghon. He, along with his father, was one of many Pilgrims who followed Matriarch Kolovish to the planet Tython in the aftermath of the Great Galactic War and the enslavement of Ryloth by the Hutt Cartel. Assisting in the establishment of Kalikori village, Ghon was bereaved when he learned that his father had been killed and eaten by a band of Flesh Raiders in the Tythos Ridge.
